data.name: EmailVerificationSubject
data.value: Verification code - Truco Argentino

data.name: EmailLoginNotificactionBody
data.value:
Hello {0},

A recent login was detected on your Truco Argentino account.
Login time: {1} (Server time).

If it was you, you can ignore this message.
If not, please change your password immediately.

data.name: EmailLoginNotificationSubject
data.value: New login in Truco Argentino

data.name: EmailVerificationBody
data.value: Your verification code is: {0}\n\nDo not share this code with anyone else

data.name: EmailPasswordNotificationBody
data.value:
Hello {0},

This is a confirmation message letting you know that your Truco Argentino password has been successfully changed.
This change was made: {1} (Server time).

Thank you for helping us keep your account secure. The Lotso Studios team.

data.name: EmailPasswordNotificationSubject
data.value: Password successfully changed for your Truco Argentino account

data.name: ExceptionTextLogin
data.value: This user already has an active session.

data.name: ExceptionTextTooManyAttempts
data.value: Too many login attempts have been detected. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot your password?' link below. Otherwise, please wait a moment and try again.

data.name: ExceptionTextUserBanned
data.value: Your account is temporarily suspended due to toxic behavior.

data.name: EmailInvitationSubject
data.value: Invitation code - Truco Argentino

data.name: EmailInvitationBody
data.value:
Hello {0}!

{1} has invited you to play a match.
Join using the code: {2}

See you at the table!

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorUsernameExists
data.value: User availability could not be verified due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextTimeout
data.value: It seems the server is taking a long time to respond. Please try again later.

data.name: ExceptionTextErrorOcurred
data.value: An error occurred.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorEmailExists
data.value: Email availability could not be verified due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextSmtpVerification
data.value: The verification email could not be sent. Please try again later.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorGetFriends
data.value: The friends data could not be obtained due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextFriendRequestUserNotFound
data.value: The user {0} does not exist.

data.name: ExceptionTextFriendRequestAlreadyFriends
data.value: You are already friends with {0}.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorFriendRequest
data.value: The request could not be sent due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorRanking
data.value: The global top data could not be obtained due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorHistory
data.value: Data from the latest games could not be obtained due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorLogin
data.value: It was not possible to log in due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorJoin
data.value: You were unable to join the game due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorGetLobbyPlayers
data.value: The player list could not be loaded due to a database error.

data.name: ExceptionTextDBErrorGetPublicLobbies
data.value: The list of games could not be loaded due to a database error.
